Orphapacket.Label: Solitary necrotic nodule of the liver

TextSection.Contents: A rare nonmalignant hepatic lesion characterized by a mass with a completely necrotic core often partially calcified surrounded by a dense hyalinized fibrous capsule containing elastin fibers. Patients are usually asymptomatic but some may suffer from intermittent abdominal pain or discomfort.

Parent.Label: Rare tumor of liver and intrahepatic biliary tract
